Class Camera

java.lang.Object
renderer.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Camera extends Object implements Cloneable
Camera class represents a camera in 3D space. It is used to render a scene from a specific point of view.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Camera.Builder
    Builder class for Camera It is used to create a camera with specific parameters.

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      construct a ray from the camera to the point on the view plane
      Parameters:
      nX - the number of pixels in the x direction
      nY - the number of pixels in the y direction
      j - the x coordinate of the pixel
      i - the y coordinate of the pixel
      Returns:
      the ray from the camera to the point on the view plane
